thread.section_title: Red Wall Garden Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Traditional Chinese feel
thread.title_full: Traditional Chinese feel - Review of Red Wall Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: real_texican
title: Traditional Chinese feel
text:
Stayed 3 nights at Red Wall Garden Hotel. Don't let the dark alley location intimidate you. Service was great, amazing location. The staff was very helpful, I did not try the restaurant but did have drinks there one day. They do offer free wi-fi but chinese internet is not the best, used a vpn to get around the wi-fi wall.
The hotel seemed to have been a hutong at one time. Great feel, amazing staff an perfect location!
